title: Lobby
desc: Chillax amidst the chaos and the dead times
introMessage:
Welcome to Supernova!


Here, we can be able to hang around and make new friends. Also, you can participate in our lovely everyday tours which can get you bucks to buy items such as avatars, rooms, etc.

        


Announcements: The Economy, icons, custom colors, custom messages, etc. have been reset. Currently, we have some tiers that are broken at the moment. Casino has a new game: Panagrams, updated by one of Sundar's friends, Wando. We will have everyday panagrams so users can be able to win tickets by guessing pokemons!

title: Shadow Ban Room
introMessage: Welcome Staff to the Supernova Shadow Ban Room! Here, we will often see the logs of shadowbanned users when they speak in chatrooms or talk in PMs. This room is also to check over if anyone has advertised a server in Supernova (Supernova has an advertising filter). If you see anyone advertising a server through this advertisement filter in this room, lock them regardless.

title: Events
introMessage:
Welcome to EVENTS Room!

This is a room where there will be events held (competitions) for which the winners get big bucks as prices. Be sure to check out the events that will be coming up in the near future!

The tier of the week is FU.! 1st, 2nd and 3rd place in the ladder will receive 100,50,25 bucks respectively. (You are required to have atleast 10 battles to claim your reward)
desc: Wanna earn huge money? Participate in the events and win exciting prizes!

title: Help & FAQ
desc: Need help? Wanted to ask a Q? Want to report someone? This is the place.
introMessage:
HELP AND FAQ

This is a room where you can ask for help regarding PS! and can report a spammer, a person abusing their power. Do not casual chat in here. Lobby is for casual chat. If you have something very important then only PM a &/~. Constantly helping users will be room promoted. Talking here about other servers will make you lock/ban from this room , advertising isn't allowed!

You can click on the buttons below for more information regarding those topics.

Here, you can learn how to effectively team-build, battle, and analyze opponents' moves in various tiers!

If you would like to be a contributor under a tier, please talk to #Camilas. For questions on helping out with things like Battle Factory/other tiers if Camilas is busy, contact #Mystifi. -

Casino

Welcome to the Casino room! Here, users can gamble bucks, and there is a slight chance they will make an earning, or plummet to bankruptcy! Also, users can be able to participate in our lovely Casino games and participate in some bot games which people can bet on to gain/lose bucks.

Announcements: Big Six Wheel is currently being designed by one of our Administrators Mighty Sciz. While the game is being developed, have some fun by playing slots or playing dice games against people. On other news, there will be an event every weekend in which ambush or blackjack games will be hosted by our global staff in which whoever wins these games gain bucks! So be there when it happens! We have a new panagram system in which whoever wins one of these panagrams wins a buck for winning a game. Also, we have bingo implemented into the server and will be very fun.

title: How to be a staff member?
introMessage:
These are the points you should know on how we nominate users for staff.

1. First thing's first. Do NOT ask for auth. If you ask for it, even though you were going to be nominated it will just be delayed by a large amount of time and if you constantly ask for it you will never be promoted irrespective of your activity and contribution. Don't even ask for your progress and just continue the good work and you will be seeing it coming to you.

2. Users who are active and spend some time in this server are most likely going to be nominated. But more importantly the chat quality will be given a high priority. You can surely have fun and all but just don't cross the limit. Then it would seem like Spam.

3. You are not expected to be here all the time. Just being here for a long time and filling the chat with spam or annoying people would not lead to a promotion. Being here for a reasonable amount of time and helping people and taking part in events and such is what is required.

4. Code contributions are also a major step towards promotion

You don't need to take the promotion thing very competitively. We are here to have fun so let's Enjoy and just follow the rules ;)

title: Supernova Super Staff Bros.
introMessage:
Super Staff Bros. is a metagame, originally from the main server, that features each Supernova staff member's Pokemon, including custom abilities, movesets, items, custom signature move, dialogues, and many more!

SSB has now been rebranded to Supernova Super Staff Bros! We decided to not remove the previous staffs from the roster, but only have them rankless. Unfortunately, we had to remove some users due to inactivty and other matters.
[13:34:26] %TheGodOfPie: I'll drop the Ayylamo Army so hard that it'll make your mom stand from the chair!
